lead_paragraph: In a throwback to one of the greatest rivalries, the seven-time Grand Slam winner John McEnroe beat Bjorn Borg, 4-6, 6-4, 10-4, in an exhibition match yesterday in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. The two faced off 14 times in ATP tour, Davis Cup and Grand Slam play, each winning seven times.
